name: Victim (itch) (AmarDev)
description:
Made for the themed horror game jam #11. 

WHEN USING THE DOUBLE PLATFORM IN LEVEL 3, PLEASE USE THE CORNER OF THE PLATFORM TO GET UP. (Bug)

You've died. Having killed 25 people in your lifetime, you were finally caught, and hanged.  However there is no hell, at least as portrayed on earth. You were sent to the Mortis realm, where the Master of Death has set you a challenge...

But can you complete the challenge and be granted a second chance, to do better, and to make sure you aren't trapped there forever?

WASD - Movement (No S movement)

Mouse needed to play

Make sure to tell me what you think!
